mapper.update: update ums_permission set permission_name = #{permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission_desc = #{permissionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_id = #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where permission_id = #{permissionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select permission_id, permission_name, permission_desc, create_time, update_time, sys_id from ums_permission where permission_id = #{permissionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select permission_id, permission_name, permission_desc, create_time, update_time, sys_id from ums_permission
select permission_id, permission_name, permission_desc, create_time, update_time, sys_id from ums_permission where 1 = 1 and sys_id=#{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
